name: Smartwool Basic Mini Boot Socks - Women's
description: Fun and comfy socks with a roll top that eleminates pressure around the top of your ankle. The merino blend naturally regulates temperature and lets your feet breathe.Soft merino wool, nylon and spandex blend for all-day comfort.Supportive arch brace hugs your foot for a snug fit.Virtually Seamless™ toe won't cause hotspots or chafing.Narrower profile suits those with narrower feet.
